CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Highly soluble poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PQCDTB ) has been synthesized through the Suzuki coupling reaction by introducing planar quinacridone and highly absorbing benzothiadiazole.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the Material Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] |
| PQCDTB |
| quinacridone |
| benzothiadiazole |

Note that "poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole]" is a single material name, even though it contains multiple words. It is a polymer made up of quinacridone and benzothiadiazole units, and is referred to by the abbreviation "PQCDTB".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid Material Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole] |
| PQCDTB |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material names and have been removed:

* "planar quinacridone" (not a material name, but rather a description of a property of quinacridone)
* "highly absorbing benzothiadiazole" (not a material name, but rather a description of a property of benzothiadiazole)

Note that "poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole]" and "PQCDTB" are the same material name, but they are presented in different forms. "poly[quinacridone-alt-benzothiadiazole]" is the full name of the material, while "PQCDTB" is an abbreviation for the same material.
